text: Vanishing Point is a 1971 American action movie directed by Richard C. Sarafian and starring Barry Newman, Cleavon Little, Dean Jagger, Karl Swenson, Lee Weaver, Charlotte Rampling, Gilda Texter, John Amos, Rita Coolidge, Robert Donner, Paul Koslo, Owen Bush. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 action movies Category:1971 LGBT movies Category:1970s road movies Category:Cult movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American road movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard C. Sarafian Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in Nevada Category:Movies set in Utah Category:Movies about automobiles
title: Vanishing Point (1971 movie)
